机器学习部署

Publish: April 28, 2016

调研了一下，主要方法有：

  • Brute Force
  • Database
  • Dato
  • TensorFlow Serving
  • Azure
  • Pickle (do not use, vunerable)
  • skitlearn joblib
    • http://scikit-learn.org/stable/modules/model_persistence.html
  • PMML + openscoring
    • http://nerds.airbnb.com/architecting-machine-learning-system-risk/
